name: xom_v2.api
description: Docker Nginx Php-FPM mySql phpMyAdmin Backups for XOm_v2.api [php:7.4.19-fpm]

scripts._create_folders: bash -c " cd addon_files ; mkdir certs ; mkdir certs-data ; mkdir logs ; cd .. ; mkdir  mysql ; mkdir PUBLIC ; "
scripts._build: bash -c " npm run _create_folders ; npm run _build_containers ; bash ./addon_files/waiting_build_finish.sh ; npm run _build_php ; echo 'DONE BUILD'"
scripts._o_: bash -c " npm run ysc_ ; npm run b__ "
